name: The Age of Heroes
overview: Return to the days of high adventure in THE AGE OF HEROES, a fantastic arcade fantasy epic from the team that brought you the award-winning C64 sci-fi hit release Organism. Choose your warrior from the title screen and then hack and slay your way through over a dozen exquisitely detailed landscapes, slaying assorted beasts and monsters that confront you during your quest to defeat an ancient evil that has returned to your lands. ** THE AGE OF HEROES STORY ** Beyond the mountains to the east. Over the frozen wastelands and ancient temples rumours have spread of an evil rising from dark lands. A wraith from times long past has found its way back to our world and is sending forth its legions of the damned to every corner of our world to end all life. As a descendant of the warriors of light you must seek out and defeat this ancient threat and send it back to the darkworld.
